name: Hexshift (DVTZR)
description:
Four witches that all excel in very specific types of hexes, band together!
Their mission: To try and summon the demon queen, so they can take her on a date.

Will they succeed, or will they leave empty handed?
FInd out... in Hexshift, made for the 2020 Yuri Game Jam!

---------

Controls: Everything in the game is done using the mouse. 

Credits:

Lying Pink (@lyingpink): Music
Eremita (@_3remita): Design for the Glitch Witch
DVTZR (@shoyslayer): Pretty much everything else (Game design, enemy design, programming, art)
